chrome.notes: To enable Chromium support, include `{"goog:chromeOptions": {"w3c": true}}` in the [capabilities](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/WebDriver/Capabilities). This is only partially supported.

chrome_android.notes: To enable Chromium support, include `{"goog:chromeOptions": {"w3c": true}}` in the [capabilities](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/WebDriver/Capabilities).

opera.notes: To enable Chromium support, include `{"goog:chromeOptions": {"w3c": true}}` in the [capabilities](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/WebDriver/Capabilities).

safari.notes: The vendor-supported implementation for Safari is non spec-conforming and incompatible.

samsunginternet_android.notes: The vendor-supported implementation for Samsung Internet is non-spec-conforming and incompatible.
